channel.title: C# on The Programmer's Ephemeris
channel.description: Recent content in C# on The Programmer's Ephemeris

item.title: String.Format
item.description: String formatting is an essential tool in any programming language. The string object in the C# language exposes a method for string formatting that is easy to use. Check out the docs at Microsoft for more details. Examples The most common use case of the string.Format method is for passing a string representing the desired format as the first argument, and an array of objects to insert into the string.
